sentences.sContent: They captured more than ten thousand prisoners and large quantities of arms in that campaign.
sentences.sCn: 他们在那次战役中俘获了一万多战俘和大量武器。

sentences.sContent: The quantities of each element type will be handy tools for estimating the total effort required.
sentences.sCn: 每种元素类型的数量对于估计所需的总工作量将是便利的工具。

sentences.sContent: Upstream is the poisonous Berkeley Pit, an open-pit mine in Butte, which was once called the Richest Hill on Earth for the quantities of gold, silver and copper mined there.
sentences.sCn: 上游是有毒的伯克利矿坑，一个比尤特的露天矿。 它曾经被称为地球上最富有的矿山，因为这里的金、银和铜矿数量巨大。
